name: Castle Kid
description:
Description How to play

In Castle Kid, you must survive and try to defend your castle from the enemies that want to conquest it. You will fight against a variety of monsters in several rooms of the castle by using your gun.

These are the controls of our game by default. However, you can change them whenever you want

Player 1

  • Move Right: Using P
  • Move Left: Using O
  • Move Up: Using Q
  • Move Down: Using A
  • Shoot: Space

Player 2

  • Move Right: Using Right Arrow
  • Move Left: Using Left Arrow
  • Move Up: Using Up Arrow
  • Move Down: Using Down Arrow
  • Shoot: Enter

Gesture Install instructions HOW TO RUN THE GAME IN A REAL AMSTRAD CPC

Load the cassette into the device, then type RUN"[ENTER] press play, then any key.

HOW TO RUN THE GAME USING A EMULATOR

You can play the game using any AmstradCPC emulator (WinAPE, RetroVirtualMachine...). Load the file game.cdt into the emulator, then type RUN" and press ENTER.
